New Records: CJ McCollum scored a career-high 50 points in one of the greatest offensive performances in Pelicans history
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum delivered 50 points with 10 three-point baskets in 16 attempts
Post-Match Reflections: That was vintage CJ McCollum right there
I want (my kids) to know that their dad gave it his all

There’s a reason why I was able to hit 10 threes. I was at 34 percent (entering Friday’s game). I’ll be at 40 in like six days. But there’s a reason why. I work hard. I take advantage of my time. I understand how to play this game at a high level.
